Text: To all those who have continued to seed, thank you!  And to towerelect, a very big thank you and stay out of typhoons!  We owe you big time!  I'll be listening to this for months!  The sound is supurb.  And would Shrek please email me at elect.engr@hotmail.com.  Again, thanks to all.

Towerelect,
I cannot tell you how much I have appreciated all of this. As a broadcaster online, you have made my whole year. This is a great collection. And now, as you take your bow, as the curtain draws, I have to tell you how much I have appreciated you. Thank you so much for your hard work and dedication to this project. You are one hell of a seeder. One hell of a person for this. \m/ YOU ROCK \m/
